title: STEM Education Design Evaluation Workshop Based on Information Flow

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Course for pre-service/in-service teachers to master objective evaluation methods for STEM instructional design using information flow analysis. Includes hands-on practice with digital devices (tablets/laptops).

learning_goals: The efficiency of STEM instructional design can be quantitatively analyzed by applying information flow modeling
Interaction patterns among learners, instructors, and content in instructional designs can be visualized and evaluated
Improvement strategies for STEM instructional design can be proposed based on assessment results

resources: Case Study Materials (20 STEM Design Plan Samples)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
